article.headline: Charleston Southern 83, Radford 73
article.story: CHARLESTON, S.C. -- Saah Nimley and Mathiang Muo combined for 43 points as Charleston Southern beat Radford 83-73 on Thursday night in the Big South Conference opener for both teams. Nimley led all players with 22 points, while Muo chipped in with 21 points, including four 3-pointers and 7 of 9 from the free throw line for Charleston Southern (4-2). Kelvin Martin also added double figures for the Buccaneers with 17 points and a game-high nine rebounds. The Buccaneers broke open a back-and-forth contest with an 11-1 run to stretch the margin to double-digits, 70-60, and put the game out of reach. Radford (4-2) knocked down a season-high 11 of its 22 attempts from 3-point range. The freshmen backcourt of R.J. Price and Brian Darden paced the Highlanders with season-highs of 15 and 13 points, respectively. The duo combined to hit seven 3-pointers. The contest featured six ties and 11 lead changes.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).
